[[File:Flag_resisting_spells.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
The Resisting Spells skill simply grants a passive chance to reduce or prevent damage of offensive spells cast on your character. It is vital in most, if not all Player vs Player, [[templates]]. You can completely resist certain spells such as Mana Vampire or Poison.

If you have 50 Resisting Spells and you're facing off against someone with 100 [[Magery]] casting Explosion, you will have ~10% chance to resist. If you have 100 Resisting Spells against the same opponent, you will have ~50% chance to resist. Resisting a damage spell results in a 50% reduction to its base damage. Spell damage is also modified by comparing your resist to your opponent's [[Evaluating Intelligence]], whether you successfully resist a spell or not.

Resisting Spells is ''not'' enhanced by any other skills but it can be complemented by maintaining the Level 5 [[Magery]] spell Magic Reflection. UO Forever exists in an era before elemental resists were introduced. Higher Resisting Spells will therefore ''not'' alter the elemental resists shown in your [[Status]].

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-45: Buy from NPC
:45-65: Mana Drain on Self (Also raising Magery and Evaluating Intelligence)
:65-75: Mana Vampire or Energy Bolt on Self (Also raising Magery and Evaluating Intelligence)
:75-100: Mana Vampire or Flamestrike on Self (Also raising Magery and Evaluating Intelligence)

==Overdrive Notes==
GM Resisting Spells reduces spell damage by 20% ONLY on [[Overdrive|Overdrive Server]].
